summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of January 1, 2015, to January 31, 2015. It details the account balance, service charges, and criteria for waiving those charges, indicating the financial status of the business during that period.

persons.name: Philip Fintchre
persons.context: Philip Fintchre is identified as the Relationship Manager for the account held by Shocker Holdings LLC.

keyFacts: The bank statement covers the period from January 1, 2015, to January 31, 2015.
The beginning balance for the account was $22,698.30.
The statement indicates that the standard monthly service charge was waived due to meeting balance criteria.
The account is held by Shocker Holdings LLC, located at 27 High Tech Blvd, Thomasville, NC.
Philip Fintchre is the Relationship Manager associated with this account.
